mapper.select: SELECT product.name AS productName, product.main_image AS mainImage, sku.id AS id, sku.product_id AS productId, sku.code AS code, sku.name AS name, sku.price AS price, sku.stock_quantity AS stockQuantity, sku.locked_stock AS lockedStock, sku.sales_count AS salesCount, sku.status AS status, sku.create_time AS createTime, sku.update_time AS updateTime FROM product_sku AS sku LEFT JOIN product_product AS product ON sku.product_id = product.id; -- 修改此处，使用表别名 sku
